text: is a men's volleyball team based in Fuchu city, Tokyo, Japan. It plays in V.Premier League. The owner of the club is NEC. ==History== The club was founded in 1938. ==Honours== ;Japan Volleyball League/V.League/V.Premier League *Champion (4): 1991, 1993, 1995 and 1998 *Runners-up (4): 1989, 1992, 1997 and 2004 ;Kurowashiki All Japan Volleyball Tournament *Champions (7): 1992, 1994, 1994, 1997, 1999, 2003 and 2007 *Runners-up (1): 2005 ;Emperor's Cup *Champion (0): ==League Results==
